message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $12000 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is a great compromise, considering the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that $9000 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $9800. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value it brings. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $9800 is the best price for me. I'm willing to pay a premium for a great product, but I need to make sure it's worth it. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9200. Can you meet me at that price?
